content:
Hello all!
I'm a Mexican physics student interested in SIMD, parallelism, concurrency and high performance Rust. :wave:

A few things you might be interested in:

  • There's a portable-simd project that's working on improving Rust's support for SIMD.
  • The Rayon project could use people looking at scalability and performance with large numbers of CPUs (which can be tested on cloud systems).
